Hello: Hi there! How can I assist you today?
What is the fee for the course?: The fee for each course is $1000.
How is the schedule?: The schedule will be sent to your email after registration.
Who are the instructors?: Our courses are taught by experienced professionals with extensive industry knowledge.
Are there any prerequisites for this cou: There are no prerequisites for beginner courses.
Can I get a refund if I'm not satisfied?: Yes, you can request a refund within the first 14 days of the course.
What materials do I need to bring?: You need to have a personal computer with internet access.
Is there any hands-on practice?: Yes, our courses include practical exercises and projects.
How can I contact support?: You can reach our support team via email or phone.
What is the start date of the Python cou: The Python course starts on May 1, 2025.
What time are the classes held?: Classes are held from 6 PM to 9 PM, Monday to Friday.
Do I get a certificate after completing: Yes, you will receive a certificate upon successful completion of the course.
Is there any discount for early registra: Yes, there is a 10% discount for early registration.
What if I miss a class?: You can access recorded sessions if you miss a class.
Can I interact with the instructor?: Yes, you can interact with the instructor during the live sessions.
What kind of projects will we work on?: You will work on real-world projects related to the course content.
Is there any group work involved?: Yes, there will be group projects to enhance collaborative learning.
